alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Mercer (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 10:12AM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keithsburg. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Water affects houses on 1st Street in Oquawka. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 13.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
